etag="5-xCDUbRNw9Ie9F9RTvB" version="24.6.4" type="device"> <diagram name="페이지-1" id="D5HgO-Dkw9NRhykbVEi6"> <mxGraphModel dx="1311" dy="1752" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="130" width="390" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-2" value="" style="shape=datastore;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="884" y="205" width="130" height="117" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-4" value="" style="shape=actor;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="160" width="120" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-6" value="" style="shape=mxgraph.cisco.computers_and_peripherals.laptop;html=1;pointerEvents=1;dashed=0;fillColor=#036897;strokeColor=#ffffff;strokeWidth=2;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;align=center;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="-155.5" width="178" height="141" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-7" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">Client</font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(my app)</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="367.5" width="98" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-8" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">Resource Owner</font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(user)</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="48" y="330" width="95" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-9" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">Resource Server</font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(other service)</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="706.5" y="322" width="125" height="43" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-12" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">Authencation</font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">Server</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="906" y="328.5" width="90" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-39" value="" style="shape=datastore;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="704" y="205" width="130" height="117" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-43" value="<div style=""><span style="font-size: 14px; background-color: initial;">client ID : abc</span></div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">client Secret : 123</font></div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><b>1.&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: initial;"><span style="text-align: center; background-color: initial;"><strike>authorization code : 3 </strike>삭제</span></b></div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><b style="background-color: initial;"><span style="text-align: center; background-color: initial;">2-3. access token : 4</span></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="-144" width="206" height="74" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-44" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;"><span style="">client ID : abc</span><div style="">client Secret : 123</div><div style="">redirect URL : https://exam/callback</div><div style="">user_id : 1</div><div style="">scope : B,C</div><div style=""><b>1.&nbsp;<span style="text-align: center; background-color: initial;"><strike>authorization code : 3</strike> 삭제</span></b></div><div style=""><b><span style="text-align: center; background-color: initial;">2-1. access token : 4</span></b></div></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="750" y="-9" width="285" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-50" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" parent="1" target="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-6" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="641" y="130" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="326" y="-21" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-53" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>2-2. access token : 4 전달</b></span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="556" y="0.5" width="176" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="DFgQr1ivDvPBKM2LyajH-54" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>3. Client 요청시, Server는 access token을 바탕으로&nbsp;</b></font><div><font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>user id에 해당되는 사용자의 기능(B,C)을 파악하여&nbsp;</b></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>실행한다.</b></font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="670" y="152" width="350" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

user id에 해당되는 사용자의 기능(B,C)을 파악하여
